title: Research Initiatives
description: Discover our cutting-edge research in aeronautics, robotics, and advanced manufacturing.

projects.name: Unmanned Aerial Systems
projects.summary: Developing autonomous flight technologies and mission planning for UAS.
projects.about: Research into autonomy, swarm behaviors, flight planning, and resilient communications for unmanned aerial systems.
highlights: Beyond visual line of sight (BVLOS) operations
findings: Improved waypoint optimization reduces mission time by 18%
Robust comms model under contested environments

projects.name: Smart Materials
projects.about: Developing adaptive, lightweight composite materials for improved fatigue life and performance.

projects.name: Autonomous Systems
projects.summary: AI for flight autonomy, perception, and decision-making.
projects.about: Focus on perception, planning, and safe autonomy for aircraft and UAVs using ML and formal methods.
findings: Safe RL reduces unsafe interventions by 40% in sim

projects.name: UAS Traffic Management
projects.summary: Scalable traffic management for high-density UAS operations.
projects.about: Designing frameworks for deconfliction, scheduling, and regulatory integration for UAS traffic.

projects.name: Advanced Composites
projects.summary: Composite manufacturing techniques for aerospace structures.
projects.about: Researching scalable composite fabrication, joining, and repair techniques for large structures.
findings: Repair technique restores 95% of original strength

projects.name: Human-Robot Interaction
projects.summary: Bridging human factors with robotics and autonomy.
projects.about: Designing interfaces, shared control, and trust models for human-robot teams in aerospace contexts.
findings: Shared control improves task success in mixed teams

projects.name: Flight Safety Analytics
projects.summary: Data-driven methods for safety monitoring and incident analysis.
projects.about: Applying analytics and ML to flight data to detect anomalies and improve safety workflows.
findings: Predictive model flags 82% of maintenance-critical events

projects.name: Propulsion Research
projects.summary: Advanced propulsion concepts and testbed development.
projects.about: Investigating turbomachinery, alternative fuels, and test cell integration for propulsion research.
findings: Efficiency gains of 3-5% with new nozzle designs

projects.name: Sensor Fusion & Remote Sensing
projects.summary: Integration of multi-sensor data for navigation and mapping.
projects.about: Researching sensor fusion algorithms, SLAM, and remote sensing payloads for UAS and satellites.
findings: Fusion reduces localization drift by 60% in GNSS-denied scenarios
